hey guys been ages since i mapped so i got a new map here my first ze map so it will be shit lol
extract contents to c:\program files\steam\steamapps\(username)\counter strike source\cstrike

MAKE SURE YOU'VE GOT THIS(!) VERSION OR YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PLAY.


After a lot of bugs this will hopefully be the last update.
Fixed and added:

1. Customized, the fps is much higher now. This wasn't done by Makaroonivelli because he had to do other maps. It was done by me. I don't really have a big knowledge of customizing so the fps only changed 10 or 20 frames higher.

2. The leaks are gone. You can't escape from the map anymore.

3. Texture changes. Some textures are changed.

4. Doors are added and made slower to make it harder for the people to survive.

5. push at spawn is faster so there will be less people be stuck in each other.

6. Longer waiting time untill the doors open.

7. Zombies without knives bug is gone.

8. I made a little story at the beginning to introduce you the map, and made another sky camera so you will have two points of view when you join the game.

9. trigger_pushes at the teleports so camping is not impossible.

10. And some other little things.

The map didn't change a lot. But some things are better now.


Thanks for playing!

An american journalist stubbled onto the secret relation of a goverment official and a girl called Elly.
In frustration over the journalist the president makes the following statement on a pressconference.
** My fellow americans,hence the rumor is spreading that one of my officials has been having a relationship with an unknown girl called Elly we have decided to share our information. About one year ago we discovered a big meteorite heading towards earth.This meteorite has been deemed an E.L.E. hence the Elly. An E.L.E. stands for an extinction level event ,a bit like the astroid whiping out the dinosaurs.
Seeing this we have secretly begun working on the ARC ,american rescue complex. There will be a lottery deciding who gets chosen to repopulate the world,these people will get picked up by Hum-V or Hovercraft.
That is all for now **

Hearing this broadcast the AAFZ ,american asociation for zombies,has deemed this perfectly to stop the undead wave for once and for all.
It is up to u to get to the ARC intime and save our world!!
But this path is not without trouble...
Can u save us?..

Very first Counterstrike hovercraft ever!!
Inspired by the 1998' movie called Deep Impact

_sText:
Get ready to take part in the hardest map of Zombie Escape!


This map is the result of 5 months intence work. Hope you will really enjoy it. 

The map contains just 1 STAGE, but this STAGE is like 20-30 minutes long.
Also the map has difficulties (NG, NG+,NG+2, etc.), like when you beat NG (first difficulty), the NG+ will be enabled.

The map has 4 bosses ported from the game.

It contains 12 human items and 2 zombie items

The map trailer:


Also, why it isn't full or partial port. Because we made all the locations ourself, and they greately differ from the game. But on the other side, they are like the game.

Our mapping blog, where you can learn more info about our mapping:

https://steamcommunity.com/groups/headshooterandlonlly

P.S. Hopefully the map will get the CS:GO version, not fully sure yet

I dont expect people will like this map but im uploading it anyway. Basically this map is set in a blade runner esque cyber punk future and you're trapped in a big skyscaper. You have to fight your way to the top will defending yourself against zombies and activiate the nuke that will kill the zombies

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Have you ever wanted to have square grenades? to get particle-abused? to fight againts zombies with Jesus on your side?

HAVE YOU EVER WANTED TO *** RESIST! ***?

Regardless of your answer, this map is for you.

Cyberderp is a gem that features multiple cancers, along with:

- A zombie controlled Boss.
- 4 different paths (Phases).
- Custom igniting particles.
- Custom shooting sounds.
- Custom grenade models.
- Doors.
- SWAG.

_Now including buyzones._

The phases are randomly chosen. However, when one phase is won, it won't appear ever again.
I wouldn't recommend taking this map too seriously but if you do, after beating all the phases, a special mode will be unlocked (and you will be able to play any of the four phases again). If you beat this special mode, I will say something cute about you. Maybe.

About the boss:
If you are choosen as a zombie to be the boss, the usage instructions should appear on your screen.
The boss fight area will be 1 out of the 3 possible arenas.
If the boss' camera is too hard to control, you can press E to use your regular camera. But you shouldn't do it because you are a very good player and you don't need any help to kill every human.
Along with the four basic attacks, the boss will passively spawn weak minions which can actually infect humans.

This map is based on Crash Bandicoot games from playstation 1
map uses crash bandicoots oriinal soundtrack and i have been trying to create this map to look like crash bandicoot game as good as i can.
map includes:

- apples give you apple cannon ammo (if carrying it) or 10hp

you need to collect 2 diamonds to unlock apple cannon for next rounds
you get diamonds by breaking all boxes that exist on level

_sText: Map created for the game "Half - life 2 episode one". This game was taken textures,models and sounds. And then there's "Cubemap", and the map compiled with "HDR". The essence of the card is that have to flee the city to escape. At first you will appear in the city and have to run to the train station. And the map was tested and validated.

### ZE_CHRISTMAS_INFECTION

Although I would have prefered to release the map 3 days before (I had been rushing it for 5-6 days, working over what Eddie and I had done one year ago in a similar attempt), I couldn't. The map is a simple ZE without levels, two alternating paths at spawn, six human weapons and four zombie weapons. I tried to make it as seasonal as possible, although I have the feeling that some parts might look out of place.

The map takes place in the North Pole, at Santa's factory. The design is simple and I believe it's not hard to follow the paths, however, I added a radar for an easier navigation.

### Version 2_3

- Two new zombie weapons, trampoline and whirlpool generator
- Zombie-HP configs
- Vents at bridge-reactor path
- Particle changes
- Small particles indicating where presents are

### TIPS

- On MEDIUM (second level) the core of the boat must be found and carried back to the back of the boat. If you are not fast enough, you die (the nuke goes off). 

- On TOUGH, at the ending, it is a good idea to hold the rocks before the 'balloon station' at the end of the path. Zombies will jump in easily otherwise.

- On APOCALYPSE you have to press the control panel to open the doors before the cave/waterfalls area. Holding both hallways while one player presses the buttons is a good idea. 

### Mentions

- Eddie: Airboat, 'basic' factory entrance, candy canes
- Tony Montana: Industrial areas (from his scrapped project)
- Kaem: Candy canes fix
- Syoudous: Brainstorming and testing

### Features (As a list)
- 64 spawns
- 6 human weapons
- 4 zombie weapons
- Randomized weapon spawn system
- Random paths at the beginning

### Bug reports

Because of the map being done so fast, I would like to get as much feedback as possible, in order to produce a bugfree version and move on to other projects.

_aChangeLog.text: CT cant get behind the Boss using the boost anymore (Lvl1)
Moved a bit and reduced the size of the zombie detection trigger in elevator (prevent infection outside of the elevator triggering it)
Reduced the height of the big gifts (Lvl3)
Added anti-stuck teleports in the gift area (pipes and wall)
The elevator after boss now leaves after 7 seconds instead of 5 (Lvl3)
Fixed elevator leaving earlier than it should (15 sec instead of 20)
Zombies cant infect CT through the glass anymore (after lvl3 boss)

_sText:
ze_christmas

Taskuvaras created this map. There were some glitches that could make the map not stable.

Some people asked me to fix it, so I asked Taskuvaras, and we started fixing it together. 


Beta2 version: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/177956



Feature

  • 2 Special Items
  • Musics
  • Packed Entwatch config
  • 6 Levels (3 Normal then 3 Extreme)
  • custom_particle nomenclature
  • Roundtime is 10 minutes


What's new ?

  • Train is removed. It was getting a lot of people stuck. It still play a role in blocking paths.
  • New areas added
  • Teleport Glitches fixed
  • Zombie wont be able to infect CT in elevator (ZR crash fixed)
  • Added Boss Hpbar for the Level1 & Level2 Bosses
  • Reduced entity usage
  • Reduced bsp size by 100 mb (removed all files not used)
  • No more invisible clip blocking player


Report any glitches, or problem you found.

Ask me if you want the vmf for CS:GO port.

Ze Christmas

Map Design by Taskuvaras and Black ninja called hala,
Model edit/animations by Kaesar
Special thanks to Enviolinador custom textures by Taskuvaras

INFO: Map has 3 levels made so far (maybe more coming in future),there are some special weapons hidden in the map. map contains 3 boss fights, secret rooms and other secret stuff. there are 10 cats hidden in every level, if you collect (shoot) all of them the boss battle is made easier.

This is a mix version of ze_the_chicken_lords_tower

- The icy slide ramp is removed
- Tried to tone down the AWP abuse a bit by adding a few invisible walls at certain spots. You can still shoot zombies off most sides of the tower, though.
- Humans who jump/fall in the water at the beggining will now die instead of being teleported onto the bridge.
- Added a small plank that covers part of the first jump spot 30 seconds after someone passes it. (the second jump spot already has a small walkway on the side).
- Two new paths to take at the beggining, as an attempt to fix the terribad spawn.
- The chicken will now actually kill people.
- Fixed spots where you could jump around walls and such instead of waiting.
- Reduced the gate trap's wait time from 30 to 20 seconds.
- The water inside the tower now pushes back both humans and zombies, so they can't just jump in and skip the platforms all the way to the ladder. It also still hurts humans, but their health is still set to 100 once they manage to get to the ladder.
- Added a small holding spot at the top of the tower so humans actually have a chance instead of the zombies just running up and knifing everyone.
- Replaced most of the textures, as well as fixed a lot of errors.
- New lighting. Say goodbye to the crappy fullbright lighting.
- New escape platform at the ending and a console message about when it starts to leave so half the team doesn't end up missing it.

Link to original map - http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/130667

ZE_CANAL_ESCAPE Created by: £cho Recommended Players: 24-32 Maximum Players: 64 Time Spent: 144 hrs. This map takes place in a familiar setting. While it might just look like another version of boatescape, it's not, and I made this entirely on my own. This map is very different from boatescape in many ways, one of which is that this one gets better FPS, and has an objective at the end. The canal aspect only plays a role in about 3/4 of the map, and then it's up to you to hold the fort at the end of the canal, hold up in a bunker, and wait for the nuke to go off. This map took approx. 144 hours to create, and I'm very proud of it. While it might not be my most detailed work, I tried my best to make up for it in the lighting, ambiance, and gameplay. Please, before you assess, try out the map for yourself and you'll see what I'm talking about. As always, comments, assessments, and stamps are more than welcome. Just keep in mind what I said above before you do any of that. Thanks and enjoy! =D Regards, £cho Creator of Headcrab Hunter 2 www.headcrabhunter.com

V1_8

- bug fix for the second way on right (where you need to break crates and jump), 2 entites were called at the same time and spawn wrong crates
- adjust window pass, CT no longer can go back on the unbreakable
- change and increase plank size in cave way to avoid edgers
- add a push in water way on first left + message to help CT to know where to go
- adjust pillar and bridge life (harder)
- add different exit ways for zombies at start to avoid rush
- add life to zm for the ending (only for guys who were zombies at the exit of the cave)
- increase difficulty at 2 ways :
    the breakable walls before the cave are now random
    at the end, you may have 3 ways to cover
- and some little changes

V1_5

- add some seconds when CT had to run after doors opening
- adjust glass health and texture
- optimize entity
- add zm hp at start
- modify pillar cover point and health
- modify bridge health too
- add clip on chopper to avoid noob running for nothing
- fix a little glitch that show messages on left way when you break too much crate and make trouble when you cover the water point

V1_1

- Correction of bug map on left first way
- Changing how first door are open, it was depending on the crate broken but was always the same, now it's random
- Increase speed of the opening doors X2
- New spawn with crate in the middle (for less rush)
- Modify the health of breakable, add/remove health depending of the number of CT/ZM
- Some CT help (adding crate to stop zm)
- Different texture between breakable/unbreakable
- Adding time to the map (+1minute)
- Adding music to the ending
- Help CT on first right way with teleport instead of falling in the forest, and removed the clip on trees
- Add more console message and visual indications

You are being lead by the Head of Security to evacuate the undead infested prison. Keep away from dark areas where the zombies may be lurking, waiting to ensnare you and devour all. Quickly make your way to the finish where you must hold off and wait for the military jets to arrive.

There are several secrets in this map, waiting to be discovered, so get searching!

This is my 2nd map and has 64 spawn points.

Rate and mention any problems you have found with the map please, all contributions help me to improve my mapping skills and produce and release more maps!

**Update: b1 --> b1a**
-------------------
Increased spawn-points from 32 to 64, Added a buy-zone, Reduced final hold-off time to 70 seconds, Moved some boxes around for balancing issues.

This map is dumb
like me
and you.

##### Features

- 64 spawnpoints
- No particles so other maps don't blow up
- Nothing interesting
- At all
- Absurd references to things that aren't cool at all
- Music that is pants on head level dumbo
- Obnoxious filesize (sorry for that)

##### GEGEGE
